Class UserInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserInput

  • public class UserInput
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the necessary static methods for getting proper and robust input from the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      UserInput()

      Gets the year to be searched from the user and returns it
